meanings.definition: The phenomenon of a plant having different types of leaves on the same plant.
meanings.sent1: Heterophyllies can make a plant look very unique.
meanings.sent2: The garden displayed beautiful heterophyllies with various leaf shapes.
meanings.sent3: The plant's heterophyllies seemed like a leafy puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Each leaf's heterophyllies told a different story of growth.
meanings.sent5: The heterophyllies of the plant were like a colorful leaf collection.

meanings.definition: The condition of having leaves that vary in shape or size on the same plant.
meanings.sent1: The heterophyllies of the tree puzzled the botanist.
meanings.sent2: The gardener admired the heterophyllies of the shrub.
meanings.sent3: The plant's heterophyllies made it a leafy chameleon.
meanings.sent4: The heterophyllies of the plant danced in the wind like leafy ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The unique heterophyllies of the plant caught everyone's attention.
